message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, I understand it might seem pricey, but I assure you it's worth every penny. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special introductory price of $120. This offer is exclusive to you and is an opportunity not to be missed. Please let me know if this works for you, or if you need more information to make a decision.
